role_definition: Maintain and administer a counterparty risk rating
example_of_use: A back office function tracks transaction activity and external rating details to maintain counterparty credit ratings
executive_summary: Counterparty Risk capability maintains and administers counterparty risk ratings by tracking transaction activities and external rating details to assess and monitor credit risk exposure to counterparties.

scenarios.name: Credit Rating Maintenance
scenarios.description: A back office function tracks transaction activity and external rating details to maintain counterparty credit ratings

scenarios.name: Risk Assessment Update

scenarios.name: Credit Risk Monitoring
scenarios.description: Ongoing monitoring of counterparty credit risk exposure and performance
